step_order.description: The sequence of this step within its tour (1, 2, 3, etc.)

target_selector.description: CSS selector for the element to highlight (e.g., '#first-program-card'). Leave null/empty for welcome/info steps.

title.description: Title shown in the tour popup

placement.description: Where the popup appears relative to target

mode.description: Interactive requires clicking target to proceed

size.description: Size of the popup card (only applies to welcome/info steps)

gap.description: Gap in pixels between the popup and target element (or viewport edge for welcome steps)
